pos_mean_info_list.mean: 促进食欲的；美味可口的；开胃的，诱人的
食欲的；有食欲的；开胃的

word_group.brief_definition: 食欲丧失；食欲不振；食欲减退
很好的胃口；良好的食欲
食欲抑制药；食欲抑制剂
地方性的偏好；当地的偏好
玩滑板的欲望；玩滑板的偏好

bilingual.target: 锻炼可以帮助改善你的食欲。

bilingual.source: High levels of leptin can reduce appetite.
bilingual.target: 高水平的瘦素可以减少食欲。

bilingual.source: The smell of the food increased my appetite.
bilingual.target: 食物的香味增加了我的食欲。

bilingual.source: Taking a walk ante cibum can increase your appetite.
bilingual.target: 饭前散步可以增加食欲。

bilingual.source: The ogre was known for his terrible appetite.
bilingual.target: 食人魔以他可怕的食欲而闻名。

bilingual.source: The medication can sometimes reduce your appetite.
bilingual.target: 这种药有时会减少你的食欲。

bilingual.source: She lost her appetite after hearing the bad news.
bilingual.target: 听到坏消息后，她失去了食欲。

bilingual.source: The sight of the feast was engorging his appetite.
bilingual.target: 宴会的景象使充满了他的食欲。

bilingual.source: The stinking fish made everyone lose their appetite.
bilingual.target: 发臭的鱼让大家都失去了食欲。

list.abstract: appetite（英 [ˈæpɪtaɪt]，美 [ˈæpɪtaɪt]），英语单词，作名词为食欲；满足人体需要的欲望；对…的渴望。例句：Here's an extract to whet your appetite.（这里有一段摘录能吊起你的胃口。） appetite的近义词有weakness、habit、hobby。

yingyinNormal.en: George seems to have got his appetite back!
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔治似乎已经把他的食欲找回来了。

yingyinNormal.en: You know what? You don't wanna spoil your appetite. Hey, Sugar-O's!
Chocolate cake! My word! George seems to have got his appetite back!
yingyinNormal.zh: 巧克力蛋糕。我的天！乔治似乎把他的食欲找回来了。

yingyinNormal.en: Chocolate cake! My word! George seems to have got his appetite back!
yingyinNormal.zh: 巧克力蛋糕。我的天！乔治似乎把他的食欲找回来了。

yingyinNormal.en: In particular, the neurotransmitter called serotonin controls appetite, sleep, memory, learning and in this case, mood.
yingyinNormal.zh: 特别的是，复合胺，神经传递介质一种，控制了食欲、睡眠、记忆、学习，这情况下，还改变了情绪。
搞定啦。做好啦！祝您用餐愉快。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm surprised you have an appetite after meeting with Dunbar.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我很惊讶你在见过邓巴之后居然还有胃口。

yingyinNormal.en: Men like you don't show up for dinner without an appetite.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你这种人如果没有胃口，是不会赴宴的。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, no. you kids have fun. I don't have an appetite anyway.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，你们好好玩，反正我也没胃口。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, Ma, I'll be home for dinner. No, I'm not ruining my appetite with candy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 会啦，妈，我会回家吃饭。我才不会吃糖果然后晚饭吃不下。

yingyinNormal.en: What was she like? She was the total package. Smart, beautiful, tremendous appetite. She was the love of my life.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她什么样？她简直完美，聪明，美丽，食量巨大，她是我一生的挚爱。

yingyinNormal.en: And yet, here you are. Your friend didn't make it this far. Maybe you've got more of an appetite for this than you think.
yingyinNormal.zh: 结果呢，看吧，你的朋友没能撑到这里，也许你的欲望比自己想象中的更多。

yingyinNormal.en: What do you recommend for someone who worked up a man-sized appetite from a morning of weight training and cardio funk? A shower.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对于做了一早上的举重和有氧锻炼，冒着甜美气息的我，有什么推荐菜式？洗澡。

yingyinNormal.en: But if you've got an appetite for the very best things that life has to offer, this is the destination for you. There's enough to feast on here for a lifetime!
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果您想享受最优质的生活品味，纽约绝对是适合您的旅游胜地，一生人总要来一次，享受这里丰盛和精彩的生活！

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Since technology has such an insatiable <highlight>appetite</highlight> for eating up human jobs, this phenomenon will continue to restructure our economy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于技术对吞噬人类工作的欲望是无穷无尽的，所以该现象将会继续重塑我们的经济结构。

word_usage.usage:
appetite作名词，表“渴望”时，为可数名词，后跟for sth./for doing sth.表示"对……的强烈渴望"。例：
The public have an insatiable appetite for scandal.
公众对丑事总是喜闻乐道。

examination_example.sentence: Alexandra Johnstone, professor of <highlight>appetite</highlight> research at the University of Aberdeen, argues that it may simply be because breakfast-skippers have been found to be less knowledgeable about nutrition and health.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 阿伯丁大学食欲研究教授 Alexandra Johnstone 认为，这可能只是因为不吃早餐的人，对营养和健康的知识了解比较少。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Research suggests warm colors fuel our <highlight>appetites</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究表明暖色会刺激我们的食欲。

examination_example.sentence: Jazz seems like it's not really a part of the American <highlight>appetite</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 爵士乐似乎不太符合美国人的胃口。

examination_example.sentence: "Jazz seems like it's not really a part of the American <highlight>appetite</highlight>, " Moran tells National Public Radio's reporter Neal Conan.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 莫兰告诉国家公共广播电台的记者尼尔·柯南：“爵士乐似乎并不受美国人的喜爱。”
